constraint.error-msg: To indicate if you would like to keep this study open at this time is required!
To indicate if there has been any change, in the opinion of the investigator, which affects this study's exempt review classification is required!
To indicate the status of the study is required!
To describe the status of the study is required!
To indicate if this is a chart review or archived tissue sample study only is required!
To indicate how many charts you have reviewed/archived tissue samples you have worked with is required!
To indicate all of the vulnerable populations from which you've enrolled subjects locally, since activation of the study is required!
To summarize study progress is required!
To indicate if subjects have experienced any benefits since your last report is required!
To explain why subjects have experienced any benefits since your last report is required!
To indicate if any subjects have withdrawn from the research since your last report is required!
To explain why some subjects have withdrawn from the research since your last report is required!
To indicate if any subjects or others have complained about the research since your last year is required!
To explain why some subjects or others have complained about the research since your last year is required!
To indicate if there have been any publications in the literature relevant to the risks or potential benefits of the research since your last report is required!
To explain why there have been any publications in the literature relevant to the risks or potential benefits of the research since your last report is required!
To indicate if there have been any interim findings since your last report is required!
To explain why there have been any interim findings since your last report is required!
To indicate if there have been any multi-center trial reports since your last report is required!
To explain why there have been any multi-center trial reports since your last reportis is required!
To indicate if there have been any data safety monitoring board reports since your last report is required!
To explain why there have been any data safety monitoring board reports since your last report is required!
To indicate if there have been any other relevant information regarding this research, specifically information about risks associated with the research since your last report is required!
To explain why there have been any other relevant information regarding this research, specifically information about risks associated with the research since your last report is required!
To indicate if the risks or potential benefits of this research have changed since your last report in the opinion of the principal investigator is required!
To explain why the risks or potential benefits of this research have changed since your last report in the opinion of the principal investigator is required!
To indicate if there have been any internal or local adverse events in the research since the last report is required!

To indicate if these adverse events occured at the frequency and level of severity expected, as documented in the current research protocol, the informed consent document, and any investigator brochure/device manual is required!
To indicate if these adverse events changed the risk/benefit ratio for local subjects, or reflect a discernible pattern that would indicate an impact on human subject protections is required!

To indicate if the study sponsor has provided information indicating that these events represent a change in the risk/benefit ratio for local subjects,and that amended study documents and/or procedures are expected is required!

To briefly describe these local adverse events here and upload a summary table in the Document section of this form. The IRB encourages use of our Events and Deviations Table for summary reporting is required!
To indicate if there have been any protocol deviations or violations occurred in this study since the last report is required!
To indicate if the protocol deviations/violations occured in a pattern that indicates a need to revise study processes is required!
To indicate if the protocol deviations/violations negatively impacted the ability to use the data is required!
To indicate if the protocol deviations/violations negatively impacted the ability to use the data is required!
To indicate if this study has been audited by the FDA, NIH, NCI OR other federal agency since your last report is required!
To indicate the date of audit is required!
To indicate if a report has been issued is required!
To indicate if you have submitted a copy of the report is required!
To indicate if this study is subject to any litigation is required!
To indicate if the IRB has been notified is required!
To explain why the IRB has not been notified is required!
To indicate if there are any publications or presentations that have resulted from data collected during this study is required!
To indicate if there have been a change in the financial disclosure status of the Principal Investigator or other members of the Research Staff that has not been reported to the IRB is required!
To explain why there have been a change in the financial disclosure status of the Principal Investigator or other members of the Research Staff that has not been reported to the IRB is required!
